message: Deferred imports are only supported when the '--module' flag is set to 'esnext' or 'preserve'.
suggestion: Change the module target to 'esnext' or 'preserve' in tsconfig.json to support deferred imports, or use regular imports instead of deferred imports.

example.description: Change deferred import to regular import

example.base:
// tsconfig.json: { "compilerOptions": { "module": "commonjs" } }
import defer * as MyModule from './module'
example.fixed:
// tsconfig.json: { "compilerOptions": { "module": "esnext" } }
import defer * as MyModule from './module'
example.description: Update module target to support deferred imports
